long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quote buddy is your personal news-reading companion. It scans your browser for quotes, enabling you to scroll straight to the relevant content.

How often have you clicked on a news article with irrelevant prose only to look for what was really said? Quote buddy helps you keep informed beyond the headline while saving you time and effort.
